value.title: We can reduce gender bias in natural-language AI, but it will take a lot more work
value.excerpt: If we know our models learn bias from data, perhaps de-biasing data is the best approach to solving the problem.

value.title: Prominent Google AI ethics researcher’s ousting sparks ethics, bias concerns
value.excerpt: Prominent artificial intelligence scholar Timnit Gebru helped improve Google’s public image as a company that elevates Black computer scientists and questions harmful uses of AI technology.

value.title: Tesla cuts Full Self-Driving upgrade price by $1,000 for some customers
value.excerpt: Tesla has cut the price of a Full Self Driving upgrade by $1,000, but only for people with Enhanced Autopilot-equipped cars.

value.title: Elon Musk reveals Tesla's plan to be at the forefront of a self-driving car revolution – and why he wants to be buried on Mars
value.excerpt: Tesla CEO Elon Musk sat down with Axel Springer CEO Mathias Döpfner for an interview during his visit to Germany.

value.title: Top 20 Predictions Of How AI Is Going To Improve Cybersecurity In 2021
value.excerpt: In 2021, cybersecurity vendors will accelerate AI and machine learning app development to combine human and machine insights so they can out-innovate attackers intent on escalating an AI-based arms race.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning To Play Key Role In Fight Against COVID, Say Experts
value.excerpt: Senior Scientist (Deep Learning and Genomics) at NVIDIA - said larger data sets on genome sequences (DNA arrangement) are being acquired, and this data is being studied for multiple parameters.

value.title: A robot is now making Jamba smoothies in a California Walmart in less than 3 minutes
value.excerpt: The contactless kiosk uses a robotic arm to retrieve the ingredients and make the smoothie. It's one of Blendid's five kiosks in California.

value.title: Training facial recognition on some new furry friends: Bears
value.excerpt: A few years ago the pair became mesmerized, like many of us, by an Alaskan webcam broadcasting brown bears from Katmai National Park. They also happened to be seeking a project to hone their

value.title: Did Google's DeepMind Just Revolutionize Medicine?
value.excerpt: DeepMind has just provided an answer, and it is blowing the minds of researchers. For nearly 50 years, scientists have questioned how proteins know what shape to fold themselves into, and do it repeatedly time after time.

value.title: Google widely criticized after parting ways with a leading voice in AI ethics
value.excerpt: Many Google employees and others in the tech and academic communities are furious over the sudden exit from Google of a pioneer in the study of ethics in artificial intelligence—a departure they see as a failure by an industry titan to foster an environment supportive of diversity.

value.title: Using a test framework to design better experiences with Amazon Lex
value.excerpt: Chatbots have become an increasingly important channel for businesses to service their customers. Chatbots provide 24/7 availability and can help customers interact with brands anywhere, anytime and on any device. To effectively utilize chatbots, they must be built with good design, development, test,

value.title: MLCommons debuts with public 86,000-hour speech data set for AI researchers
value.excerpt: If you want to make a machine learning system, you need data for it, but that data isn’t always easy to come by. MLCommons aims to unite disparate companies and organizations in the creation of large public databases for AI training,

value.title: AI Weekly: In firing Timnit Gebru, Google puts commercial interests ahead of ethics
value.excerpt: With the firing of Timnit Gebru this week, Google implicitly signaled that it's willing to put commercial interests ahead of all else.

value.title: This 25-year-old is now a billionaire, after his self-driving car company Luminar went public
value.excerpt: Austin Russell founded Luminar Technologies in 2012 and joins a short list of people who have amassed a billion-dollar fortune before the age of 30

value.title: Improving ophthalmologic care through artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: For some, hearing the words artificial intelligence, or AI, sparks imaginative scenes of robot overlords, self-driving cars, dystopian surveillance, chatbots, and machines replacing humans at work.

value.title: Getting there: Structured data, semantics, robotics, and the future of AI
value.excerpt: Leveraging structure in data is key to making progress in AI, says AI prodigy Gary Marcus. A forward-looking view on Software 2.0, AI chips, robotics, and the future of AI

value.title: New WMG AI algorithms raises hope for human-like Robot hands
value.excerpt: Researchers at WMG, University of Warwick, have produced groundbreaking artificial intelligence algorithms that enable a robot to perform dexterous manipulation of objects just like humans. While dexterous manipulation of objects is a basic and perfunctory task for humans,

value.title: Not All Sunshine and Rainbows: Waymo’s Self-Driving Cars Take on Inclement Weather
value.excerpt: Until now, self-driving cars have mostly breezed around the sunny streets of places like Arizona and Northern California

value.title: Has Intuitive Surgical Only Scratched The Surface of Robotics?
value.excerpt: Robotics-assisted surgery will keep growing for decades, and despite its hefty price, this stock is just getting started.

value.title: How AI Is Making An Impact On The Surveillance World
value.excerpt: Numerous states are adopting sophisticated AI surveillance technologies -- some legitimate, some violating human rights and some of which fall into a gray area.

value.title: Avaaz: Facebook continues to fail at flagging false and misleading posts about U.S. elections
value.excerpt: According to nonprofit group Avaaz, Facebook is failing to flag false information about the upcoming Georgia special elections.

value.title: Google staff hit out at effort to 'silence' AI ethics leader
value.excerpt: More than 400 employees of the US firm signed a letter saying Timnit Gebru's departure was 'a moment of reckoning beyond Google'

value.title: Darktrace Says Its AI Can Be Used for Performance Monitoring
value.excerpt: Darktrace Ltd.’s artificial intelligence could be used to better “understand the productivity and performance” of employees, the British company’s Chief Strategy Officer Nicole Eagan said.

value.title: Sundance joins Digital Catapult’s Machine Intelligence Garage AI/ML incubator
value.excerpt: Sundance Multiprocessor Technology Ltd has joined Digital Catapult’s Machine Intelligence Garage business incubator to accelerate and deep-en its knowledge of artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques.

value.title: Google Scientist’s Abrupt Exit Exposes Rift in Prominent AI Unit
value.excerpt: Google’s decision to part ways with a prominent researcher laid bare divisions within the company’s artificial intelligence unit and subjected its leader, the lauded software engineer Jeff Dean, to widespread scorn.
